LanguageData.AM_TantrumRitualOutcome.description: Залежно від якості ритуалу, учасники отримають від {MINMOOD} до {MAXMOOD} настрій на {MOODDAYS} днів.
LanguageData.AM_TantrumRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.0: The {0} was terrible. We hardly destroyed anything, sore fists for nothing
LanguageData.AM_TantrumRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.1: The {0} was mediocre. Wasn't as fun as one could've hoped to destroy all that
LanguageData.AM_TantrumRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.2: {0} пройшло Добре We've left a decent pile of rubble behind and the stress has been released
LanguageData.AM_TantrumRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.3: The {0} was invigorating. We've destroyed a great deal of what made this place horrible. A real fresh start!
LanguageData.AM_TantrumRitualOutcome.comps.0.label: wealth destroyed
